name: Mini Minny and the Missing Magic
storyline:
In a magical world,
not too unlike ours,
a wacky little witch,
plays with her powers!

Using her mom’s cauldron,
she tries to brew a potion,
but something goes wrong,
and she causes an explosion!

And now she’s on a mission,
to find all that’s been lost,
and to bring back the magic,
no matter the cost!
summary: Find all of the items and clean up the mess before your mom gets home!
